Lamivudine was the first drug to be used as an alter native to IFN-Î± for the treatment of CHB.
175, 176 In a double-blind study involving about 350 patients with CHB, lamivudine was associated with substantial histologic improvement, HBeAg antibody seroconversion, and ALT normalization.
177 However, relapses are common once treatment is discontinued.
